Izze Ad Campaign

Concept

The concept behind this design was to target the secondary market and generate more sales for the company. The younger audience was somehow being missed and this campaign has an eye-catching design sure to target the secondary target audience.

Tools Used

04/22/2014

The Trenches Media© 2015

Work.

Syd.

Currently based out of Ottawa, ON but not subjective to a location. Always moving and progressing, wherever that may be.

A generalist designer who enjoys working on new projects in different aspects of design to keep my brain stimulated. An ideas person—as well as a follow through person with an unquenchable desire to learn.

When I'm not in front of a screen you can find me in a thrift store searching for potential or outside playing a sport I'm no good at just for the fun of it. Ask me to go sky-diving grey cssand we'll book a time for tomorrow.

Concept

The concept behind this design was to target the secondary market and generate more sales for the company. The younger audience was somehow being missed and this campaign has an eye-catching design sure to target the secondary target audience.

Work.

Syd.

Currently based out of Ottawa, ON but not subjective to a location. Always moving and progressing, wherever that may be.

A generalist designer who enjoys working on new projects in different aspects of design to keep my brain stimulated. An ideas person—as well as a follow through person with an unquenchable desire to learn.

When I'm not in front of a screen you can find me in a thrift store searching for potential or outside playing a sport I'm no good at just for the fun of it. Ask me to go sky-diving grey cssand we'll book a time for tomorrow.
